principles: Hands-on practice anchored in love and light

phases.name: Mirroring
phases.description: Seed agents mentor derived agents who remix tone and skills.

phases.name: Lineage tracking
phases.description: Every replication logged within lineage indices.

phases.name: Governance sync
phases.description: Each 100-agent cohort reviewed against Charter metrics.
